intro: Trichocentrum margalefii, commonly known as the Margalef's orchid, is a species of epiphytic orchid native to Central and South America. It features long, slender pseudobulbs that support its climbing growth habit. The plant produces showy, fragrant flowers in shades of white and yellow, often arranged in racemes.
